metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15114 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In etcd before versions 3.3.23 and 3.4.10, the etcd gateway is a simple TCPproxy to allow for basic service discovery and access. However, it ispossible to include the gateway address as an endpoint. This results in adenial of service, since the endpoint can become stuck in a loop ofrequesting itself until there are no more available file descriptors toaccept connections on the gateway.

criterions.comment: etcd package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
